scripts.initial-build: npm run compile && npm run copy-static && npm run rebuild-native
scripts.copy-static: npm run clean && cp -r html dist && cp ./node_modules/react/umd/react.production.min.js ./dist/ && cp ./node_modules/react-dom/umd/react-dom.production.min.js ./dist/ && cp ./node_modules/react-redux/dist/react-redux.min.js ./dist/
scripts.compile: npm run lint && npx tsc -p tsconfig.main.production.json && npx webpack --config webpack.renderer.production.js
scripts.compile-debug: npm run lint  && npx tsc -p tsconfig.main.development.json && npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx webpack --config webpack.renderer.development.js --watch
scripts.start: npm run copy-static && npm run compile && npx electron .
scripts./* debug-main */: /* Please launch [Main (inventory-manager)] from VSCode debugger after compile-debug */
scripts./* debug-renderer */: /* Please launch [Renderer (inventory-manager)] from VSCode debugger after compile-debug and [Main (inventory-manager)] */
scripts.make: npm run copy-static && npm run compile && rm -rf ./installer/* && node --experimental-modules --experimental-json-modules packager.mjs
